name: Calavo Growers, Inc.
description: Calavo Growers, Inc. is a leading global avocado and fresh food company, dedicated to providing high-quality products and innovative solutions in the fresh produce industry. Founded in 1924, Calavo has established itself as a trusted partner for growers, retailers, and foodservice operators. The company sources avocados from both domestic and international suppliers, ensuring year-round availability of this popular fruit. In addition to avocados, Calavo offers a wide range of fresh foods, including prepared guacamole, salsa, and other value-added products. With a strong commitment to sustainability and food safety, Calavo implements rigorous quality control measures and environmentally responsible practices throughout its supply chain. The company is also focused on innovation, continuously developing new products to meet consumer demand for healthy and convenient food options. Calavo is well-positioned in a growing market, benefiting from the increasing popularity of avocados and the trend toward healthier eating. Its dedicated team works to enhance customer satisfaction and strengthen relationships with stakeholders, aiming to be the go-to source for fresh avocados and related products. With a rich history and a forward-looking approach, Calavo Growers continues to thrive as a significant player in the fresh produce sector.
